content.query:
CREATE SCHEMA staging
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT parquet_file_format
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'nyc_green_taxi_src') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE nyc_green_taxi_src 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://nyc-green-taxi-data@nyctaxisynapsedl.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE staging.trip_data_green (
	[year] nvarchar(4000),
	[month] nvarchar(4000),
	[borough] nvarchar(4000),
	[trip_date] date,
	[trip_day] nvarchar(4000),
	[trip_day_weekend] nvarchar(4000),
	[card_count] int,
	[cash_count] int,
	[trip_distance] float,
	[trip_duration] int,
	[fare_amount] float
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'gold/trip_data_green',
	DATA_SOURCE = nyc_green_taxi_src,
	FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM staging.trip_data_green
GO

CREATE SCHEMA dwh
GO

CREATE TABLE dwh.trip_data_green
WITH (CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX,
	 DISTRIBUTION =ROUND_ROBIN)
AS
SELECT  * FROM staging.trip_data_green
GO
